title: The Songs of Solomon: A Pillow Book for Breast Cancer Survivors & Their Lovers
description: Breast cancer and returning to your whole self. Take your time as you explore the images coupled with the texts from the Song of Songs- Allow all that has kept you fettered to unravel as you tap into your sensual self. Savor the words as you release them to the one you love most. Within the circle of unconditional love you are safe.
author: Toni Barca
